languages.text: Некоторые виды {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия позволяют совершать атаки по области и поражать сразу несколько целей. Совершая такую атаку, персонаж делает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} для каждой цели по правилам {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночного выстрела{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от такой атаки получают как противники, так и союзники, оказавшиеся в зоне поражения. Если против одной или нескольких целей проверка попадания провалилась, цель все равно получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}попадания по касательной{/g} — он равен 50% от обычного урона, но может быть увеличен с помощью {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.
languages.original_text: Some ranged weapons allow you to make AoE attacks and hit multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit test for each target according to the rules of a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single Shot{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from such attack is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit check fails against one or more targets, the target will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}Grazing Hit{/g} damage — equal to 50% of normal damage, but can be increased by talents and abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Некоторые виды оружия дальнего боя позволяют совершать атаки по области и поражать сразу несколько целей.
Совершая такую атаку, персонаж делает проверку попадания для каждой цели по правилам {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночного выстрела{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} от такой атаки получают как противники, так и союзники, оказавшиеся в зоне поражения. Если против одной или нескольких целей проверка попадания провалилась, цель все равно получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}попадания по касательной{/g} — он равен 50% от обычного урона, но может быть увеличен с помощью талантов и способностей.

Некоторые виды оружия дальнего боя позволяют совершать атаки по области и поражать сразу несколько целей.
Совершая такую атаку, персонаж делает проверку попадания для каждой цели по правилам {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночного выстрела{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} от такой атаки получают как противники, так и союзники, оказавшиеся в зоне поражения. Если против одной или нескольких целей проверка попадания провалилась, цель все равно получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}попадания по касательной{/g} — он равен 50% от обычного урона, но может быть увеличен с помощью талантов и способностей.

languages.text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
languages.original_text: Некоторые виды {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия позволяют совершать атаки по области и поражать сразу несколько целей. Совершая такую атаку, персонаж делает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} для каждой цели по правилам {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночного выстрела{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от такой атаки получают как противники, так и союзники, оказавшиеся в зоне поражения. Если против одной или нескольких целей проверка попадания провалилась, цель все равно получит урон от {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}попадания по касательной{/g} — он равен 50% от обычного урона, но может быть увеличен с помощью {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Some ranged weapons allow you to make area attacks and hit multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit test for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single Shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit check fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by talents and abilities.

Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

languages.text: Einige {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Waffen erlauben es dir, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} auszuführen und mehrere Ziele auf einmal zu {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}. Wenn du einen solchen Angriff ausführst, macht der Charakter für jedes Ziel eine Treffer-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nach den Regeln für {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschüsse{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus solchen Angriffen erleiden sowohl Feinde als auch Verbündete, die sich in dem betroffenen Gebiet befinden. Wenn die Trefferprobe gegen ein oder mehrere Ziele fehlschlägt, erleiden diese Ziele trotzdem {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}Streifschuss{/g}-Schaden. Dieser entspricht 50 % des normalen Schadens, kann aber durch {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} erhöht werden.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Einige {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} erlauben es dir, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} auszuführen und mehrere Ziele auf einmal {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}zu treffen{/g}. Wenn du einen solchen Angriff ausführst, macht der Charakter für jedes Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Trefferprobe{/g} nach den Regeln für {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschüsse{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} aus solchen Angriffen erleiden sowohl Gegner als auch Verbündete, die sich in dem betroffenen Gebiet befinden. Wenn die Trefferprobe gegen ein oder mehrere Ziele fehlschlägt, erleiden diese Ziele trotzdem {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}Streifschuss-{/g}Schaden. Dieser entspricht 50% des normalen Schadens, kann aber durch {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} erhöht werden.

languages.text: Certaines armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} vous permettent de lancer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}atteindre{/g} plusieurs cibles à la fois. Lors d'une telle attaque, le personnage se soumet à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'impact pour chaque cible selon les règles régissant les {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tirs au coup par coup{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par ces attaques s'appliquent aussi bien aux ennemis qu'aux alliés présents dans la zone concernée. Si le test d'impact échoue contre une ou plusieurs cibles, celles-ci subissent malgré tout des dégâts d'{g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}effleurement{/g}. Ces dégâts sont équivalents à 50 % des dégâts standard, mais peuvent être accrus par le biais de {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Certaines armes à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} vous permettent de lancer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteindre{/g} plusieurs cibles à la fois. Lors d'une telle attaque, le personnage se soumet à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'impact pour chaque cible selon les règles régissant les {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tirs au coup par coup{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} infligés par ces attaques portent sur les ennemis et les alliés situés dans la zone concernée. Si le test d'impact échoue contre une ou plusieurs cibles, celles-ci subissent malgré tout des dégâts de {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}coup de griffe{/g}. Ces dégâts sont égaux à 50 % des dégâts normaux, mais peuvent être augmentés moyennant des {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.

languages.text: 部分{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器可以进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，同时{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}多个目标。 进行范围攻击时，角色会根据{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}的命中{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}规则，对区域内所有目标进行攻击。区域内所有被击中的目标都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，不分敌我。即便是针对目标的命中检定失败，区域内的目标依然会承受{g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}流弹攻击{/g}伤害。流弹攻击造成的伤害为通常伤害的50%，但可以通过某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}提高。
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 部分{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器可以进行{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，同时{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}多个目标。 进行范围攻击时，角色会根据{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}的命中{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}规则，对区域内所有目标进行攻击。区域内所有被击中的目标都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，不分敌我。即便是针对目标的命中检定失败，区域内的目标依然会承受{g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}流弹攻击{/g}伤害。流弹攻击造成的伤害为通常伤害的50%，但可以通过某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}提高。

languages.text: Algunas armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} te permiten realizar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a varios objetivos a la vez. Al utilizar estos ataques, el personaje hace una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de impacto contra cada objetivo siguiendo las reglas de los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g}, y tanto los enemigos como los aliados que haya en la zona reciben el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. Incluso si la prueba de impacto falla contra uno o más objetivos, siguen recibiendo daño de {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}rasguño{/g}. Este daño equivale al 50 % del daño normal, pero se puede aumentar con {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Algunas armas a distancia te permiten realizar ataques de área para impactar a varios objetivos a la vez. Al utilizar estos ataques, el personaje hace una prueba de impacto contra cada objetivo siguiendo las reglas de los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}un solo disparo{/g}, y tanto los enemigos como los aliados que haya en la zona reciben el {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g}. Incluso si la prueba de impacto falla contra uno o más objetivos, siguen recibiendo daño de {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}rasguño{/g}. Este daño equivale al 50 % del daño normal, pero se puede aumentar con talentos y capacidades.

languages.original_text: Some ranged weapons allow you to make area attacks and hit multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit test for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Single Shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit check fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by talents and abilities.

languages.text: いくつかの{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器では{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}が可能であり、一度に複数の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}することができる。 このような攻撃を行う場合、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}のルールに則り各ターゲットへの命中{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行う。こうした攻撃は攻撃対象範囲内の敵にも味方にも{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。1以上のターゲットに対する命中判定が失敗した場合でも、これらターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}擦過攻撃{/g}のダメージを受ける。これは通常ダメージの50％に相当するが、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}により上昇することもある。
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: いくつかの遠距離武器では範囲攻撃が可能であり、一度に複数の敵を攻撃することができる。 このような攻撃を行う場合、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}のルールに則り各ターゲットへの命中判定を行う。こうした攻撃は攻撃対象範囲内の敵にも味方にも{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を与える。1以上のターゲットに対する命中判定が失敗した場合でも、これらターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}擦過攻撃{/g}のダメージを受ける。これは通常ダメージの50％に相当するが、タレントやアビリティにより上昇することもある。

languages.text: Bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} silahlar, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} yaparak aynı anda birden çok hedefi {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurabilmene{/g} olanak tanır. Karakter böyle bir saldırı yaparken, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atışın{/g} tabi olduğu kurallara göre her hedef için vuruş {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} girer. Etkilenen alanda bulunan hem düşman hem de dost birimler bu saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alabilir. Vuruş testleri bir veya daha fazla hedefte başarısız olsa bile, bu hedefler yine de {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}sıyrık{/g} hasarı alırlar. Bu hasar, normal hasarın %50'sine eşittir ancak {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceri{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerle{/g} artırılabilir.
languages.original_text: Some {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons allow you to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} multiple targets at once. When making such an attack, the character makes a hit {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} for each target according to the rules governing {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from such attacks is taken by both enemies and allies caught in the affected area. If the hit test fails against one or more targets, those targets will still take {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}grazing hit{/g} damage. This is equal to 50% of normal damage but can be increased by {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
